captions.text: Missing
You gotta be stronger cause you’re my star
You gotta be stronger cause you’re my star
I think about you and regret, I miss you
Me, who didn't want to say a word
And you who seemed and sounded indifferent
to me leaving
You're a bad girl, I'm a bad boy
Maybe we've been so from the start
Why have we obsessed over a relationship already lost
Why did we say things we didn't mean
Even when we kept fighting, why did we call it love
I tried so hard to change my habits
but you continued to look so down
Come back please
It's not easy for me to get over you right now
Not as easy as it sounds
I'm crazy, I'm crazy my girl
Are you crying like I am?
Are you listening to our song?
It's not easy, it's not easy, it's not easy
How about for you?
Everything is changing
Ever since I let you go
and how I might look without you
It all drives me crazy
Our wounds are growing deeper
More flaws we see in each other
We tried to find what's good
but maybe that was the trap
Not a cloud in the sky today
The weather is a ten out of ten
Nothing has changed, except you're not with me
This is breaking up, this is the reality
Come back please
It's not easy for me to get over you right now
Not as easy as it sounds
I'm crazy, I'm crazy my girl
Are you crying like I am?
Are you listening to our song?
It's not easy, it's not easy, it's not easy
How about for you?
Another day changes and so do I
Life was better back when I could argue with you
It was better back then
Come back please
It's not easy for me to get over you right now
Not as easy as it sounds
I'm crazy, I'm crazy my girl
Are you crying like I am?
Are you listening to our song?
It's not easy, it's not easy, it's not easy
How about for you?
Missing

comforting her they end up kissing and C.A.P dies at the end.

comments.text:
This was my interpretation. So L.joe and CAP are best friends but they're 
both in love with the same girl. The girl falls in love with CAP but CAP is 
a playboy who drinks and stuff. The girl finds out and cries and stuff, and 
every time that happens L.joe is next to her. CAP tries to apologize but 
can't. Then he dies, either because of an illness or an accident. Both 
L.Joe and the girl are sad be he was L.joes best friend and her boyfriend. 
And the last scene they're comforting each other and I hope they date? Hope 
that helps!﻿
